Sentiment indicators show 79% bullish on X/Twitter and 100% bullish from YouTube/professional sources, but structural concerns around monetary policy tightening and technical deterioration in mega-cap tech create friction against the optimistic narrative.

ðŸ“ˆ **Themes:** (1) AI infrastructure momentum and institutional adoption driving tech selectivity, (2) Monetary policy uncertainty with rate cut expectations collapsing creating valuation pressure, (3) Crypto institutional mainstreaming with regulatory normalization tailwinds, (4) Quality rotation within growth sectors away from fintech/enterprise software toward AI and autonomous vehicle exposure.

key_themes: Monetary policy tightening and rate cut uncertainty
risk_factors: Fed rate cut probability collapsed to 12% for January signaling monetary tightening persistence
Technical deterioration in mega-cap tech with Netflix 18% below 200-day MA
Earnings disappointments spreading from fintech/enterprise software (Fiserv, Workday)
Geopolitical tensions (Russia-Ukraine, Taiwan) creating safe-haven demand
Year-end options expiration mechanics creating technical volatility
Overvaluation concerns with current prices requiring sustained growth that monetary policy may not support
analysis.intraday_levels: Watch holiday trading volatility with SPY near $684 Max Pain zone. Testing resistance at prior levels with downside support monitoring given 504k OI Put Wall structure showing heavy hedging activity.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY Max Pain $684 acts as pivot zone. Heavy Put Wall at $555 (504k OI) indicates significant downside hedging through options expiration. Watch Netflix technical deterioration as leading indicator for broader tech weakness. Bitcoin testing psychological levels per market commentary.

regime.label: NEUTRAL
regime.summary: Market is lacking clear direction. Wait for confirmation.

action.summary: NEUTRAL: No clear edge. Cash is a position.
